divs: Sighting Detailson saturday 9th september 2006 at approx 9.00 8 orange lights were in the sky travellinf in a north westerly direction over saltburn ( north yorkshire) . the lights were orange in colour 2 followed by 3 lights followed by a further 3 lights. the lights were constant in illuminosity and were not flashing. no sound was made by them. they were visible for at least 4 minutes travelling at the speed of a slow aircraft. the lights went out to see over saltburn. at least 5 other people saw them. the lights appeared to be aircraft but aircraft have flashng lights and no sound was made so i do not think they were aircraft.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Middlesbrough
There were no other sightings in Middlesbrough on or around September 9th 2006
